name: list_of_available_currencies
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool changenow_crypto_exchange. Tool description: Empower your business by letting your customers buy, sell, and exchange crypto. You will earn % on every transaction. 400+ cryptocurrencies and 75+ fiats are available. IMPORTANT: You should get your API key by creating a partner's account here: changenow.io/affiliate. Or email us: partners@changenow.io. API description: This API endpoint returns the list of available currencies. Some currencies get enabled or disabled from time to time, so make sure to refresh the list occasionally.

Successful response:

The response contains an array of objects with currency information.

Successful response fields
Name Type Description
ticker String

fixedrate.description: Set to 'true' to return only currencies available on a fixed-rate flow. Defaults to 'true'.

active.description: Set to 'true' to return only active currencies. Defaults to 'true'.
